data.message: hey！I am a girl from China. Can you come to Beijing in after 3weeks？There is a basketball court named DongDan . Every sunset on Sunday in May to July get a game there from 2012. The BGM is your songs . Many basketball fans were gathering there at that time . Maybe you would know MoreFree. He is very good person . And he did a lot of important things for Chineses street ball and young people. But this year maybe the last DongDan year for these fans. I really love your  《Not Afraid》. I have tried so hard learning...I really want to sing this song before the game is completed. But I dont think I can make it. And I don't know if I can invite you to come. But I want to try！！You know how big thing if you show up there . You must know that. Nobody knows what am I doing . Nobody knows me . I am the one of fans. My name is YuQi Wang .
